bio:
Hello! My name is Jesús Ordosgoitty.

 I consider myself a Full―Stack developer focused on the Frontend with over 4 years of experience in the field. I enjoy learning new things and staying up to date with Frontend development. I like working on ambitious projects alongside professionals who are as passionate about software development quality as I am. That's why I'm always looking for new ways to improve my skills.

experiences.position: Head of Web Development & Digital Marketing
